snippet: Timothy Egan's new book "Short Nights of the Shadow Catcher: The Epic Life and Immortal Photographs of Edward Curtis," recalls a photographer who gave up glamour to create a comprehensive document of Native American life.
abstract: Timothy Egan's new book "Short Nights of the Shadow Catcher: The Epic Life and Immortal Photographs of Edward Curtis," recalls a photographer who gave up glamour to create a comprehensive document of Native American life.
